channel.title: Performance on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Newsboat Blog

item.title: The One Tab Day
item.description:
Fewer surfaces, fewer surprises. Keep the path short and the intent obvious.

Keep the system small enough to see. When every step is visible, the next decision is easy.

A tiny review catches big drift. Five minutes now saves an hour later.
